website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a bend level with superior components including a strong thumb screw,  this might be your level – this model sports the quality one would expect from Klein Tools.
pros: An excellent level for working with conduit pipes that bends easily and is capable of measuring 30, 45, and 90 degree angles
Sports 4 vials that are exceptionally accurate and easy to read, and super-strong magnets
cons: The design is somewhat bulky, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning due to made being in chIna. ...
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning due to made being in chIna. Empire makes an identical level but is USA made, for $22 from a certain store depot of home improvement.
customer_reviews.author: anonymoussquid

customer_reviews.title: A Well Made (China!), Small and Accuurate Level
customer_reviews.text: This level is not just for electricians. I wanted a small, durable level that would fit in a small pocket of a tool pouch. This fits great, is very well made and accurate. In comparing it side by side with two other levels it was spot on. The only negative - 'Made in China'. I would have happily paid more for a USA product. Otherwise, it's a great level.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman-PA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I may not have read the description correctly but this level is only about 5-6 inches long. Thought it was 9. That’s on me. I absolutely love that this thing is magnetic. I’m an electrician so when I’m mounting a panel or meter socket I can slap it right on and I don’t need another person around just to hold the level. All the vials are clear and easy to see. I haven’t figured out what the set screw thing on the end is for tho.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Klein makes great products
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic and very durable level. They work perfectly for running conduit and assisting in bending conduit. I like that it is also equipped to be used as a no-dog when bending on electric or hydraulic benders. Just know that the magnets on these levels are extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic level for commercial electrician
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic level for a commercial electrician. I've used several other levels you could get from homedepot and they were just not durable, I would accidentally drop one and the magnets would fall out. This klien level will not do that. The magnets are slotted into the level, and the strength of the magnets are insane compared to other levels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little torpedos
customer_reviews.text: These have really strong magnets. Haven't had one fall out yet. This is my second purchase of this level. Need two for fitting flanges and the other has been so reliable it was a no brainer to get the same one. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good level
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnets. Rare earth. Way better at gripping onto metal structures. Built solid and good klein quality. Worth the money spent on it
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am an IBEW electrician. A quality level is a must for quality work. Magnets are strong. I get about a year out of one of these with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Level is heavy duty and love the stay power of the magnets....best one I've had yet and I use them daily at work
customer_reviews.author: Vitta R.

customer_reviews.title: It's a level
customer_reviews.text: I like the conduit clamping screw on the end, it helps me attach it to my tool belt. The magnets are definitely powerful enough to not worry about it falling off. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Klein.
customer_reviews.text: Good Klein quality tool. Very strong magnets. Great for bending conduit. Should've bought a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic level for daily electrical construction work
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic level for daily electrical construction work. incredibly strong magnets, light, portable and can take a fall. Magnets are locked in tight.
customer_reviews.author: WMH 87

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Magnets, strong build quality
customer_reviews.text: Best torpedo level I have used. Very reasonable price. Magnets are awesome (I use it daily in my welding profession). Vials are accurate. I have bought numerous torpedo levels over the years this one is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great level
customer_reviews.text: great level once calibrated the bubble was also a little flat just needed to add some air
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Great as expected Unexpected Magnet Strength
customer_reviews.text: Great tool as expected by Klein however I’ve never seen a magnetic level with so much strength very impressive.

customer_reviews.title: Nice level
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are great but buy the bigger level from Klein . Its just easier to wirk with.
customer_reviews.author: Teri B Trebour

customer_reviews.title: It’s a level
customer_reviews.text: It’s a level.... but not like every level this one is quality, reliable, functional, the right size for most house hold projects, easy to store

customer_reviews.title: Electricians 2nd best Friend.
customer_reviews.text: Always go back to what you know best. Tried others after years of using one of these. They didnt live up to it, so went and got a new Klein because they live up to their reputation.
customer_reviews.author: tattoo

customer_reviews.title: Durable, strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He absolutely loves it. The magnet is so strong. It’s durable. And the perfect size.

customer_reviews.title: not a cheap duplication
customer_reviews.text: this is the same thing you would get at any store and the magnets are super strong

customer_reviews.title: It’s Klein
customer_reviews.text: It’s Klein. Use it for bending conduit. Everyone uses them at work. They work great

customer_reviews.title: A tad short for some things but great for many and tuff
customer_reviews.text: Been dropped off a maxed out scissor lift and it's still accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and versatile. Strong magnet keeps it where you put it. I run a lot of conduit and mostly by myself.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: The best if you work with conduits or anything similar.

customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet, you can easily s ee all angle while blending pipes

customer_reviews.title: Good level

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great conduit bending tool. I love mine.

customer_reviews.text: Great level. Holds up well. Strongest magnets. Takes a couple days to get used to, kinda have to twist or really grab ahold of it. Magnets are seriously strong

customer_reviews.text: When I removed the level from package, I noticed the 90 degree bubble extend well beyond the center lines on both sides. Upon further inspection, the fluid inside is leaking or was leaking.

customer_reviews.text: This magnetic level is the best I've ever owned. I actually referred this to a few of my fellow employees.

customer_reviews.title: Nice level, but leaked after a short while
customer_reviews.text: Good and accurate level. Magnets are strong. I use it for conduit bending for apprenticeship class. No complaints. Update: 8/20/17 So while in the bending shop using the Chicago bender I discovered that the 45 deg vial had leaked. Huge bummer since I only had the level a few months. Eventually I took it to Home Depot and told them I paid in cash and had no receipt, they swapped it out for me. I'm hoping I don't continue to have this problem or I'll be looking for a new level. I heard milwaukee makes theirs in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Hady

customer_reviews.text: Great product use it daily and never had a problem

customer_reviews.title: Nice level, expensive for what it is and the ...

customer_reviews.title: I Highly recommend this level & not only better Than the 935RB
customer_reviews.text: 1st, can't go wrong with Kline. 2nd, unbelievable price! Kline tools are more expensive, but worth it / the investment 99% of the time. I'm an electrician & use this tool regularly. Earth magnets are very strong. I Highly recommend this level & not only better than the 935RB... less expensive! Deal!

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA go with greenlee
customer_reviews.text: Was under the impression all Klein tools were made in the USA. So far every Klein tool I own is made in USA. I've had greenlee levels and last for ever even when dropped a lot still accurate. This level look decent and sturdy level accurate which what matters

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.

product_meta.title: Klein Tools 935AB4V Level, Torpedo Level is a Magnetic Conduit Level with 4 Vials, V-Groove and Magnet Track, High Viz Orange
product_meta.description: Eliminate dog legs and make conduit bending easier with the help of Klein's ACCU-BEND Magnetic Level. Powerful rare earth magnets with patented magnet track secure the level to any metal surface. The thumb screw attaches level to conduit to measure angles while bending. Large top-view vial windows are easy to ready from a variety of angles. High-visibility orange makes this level easy to find on the job site. eliminates dog legs in conduit and pipe while bending. 6.25-Inch high-visibility orange body is easy to see on jobsite. 4 vial levels with +/- 0.029 accuracy, and aluminum construction. V-Groove fits contour of conduit and pipe. US Patent 9,964,407. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.
feature_bullets: Patented magnet track prevents powerful rare earth magnets from falling out
Thumb screw attaches level to conduit to measure angle while bending
Large, easy-to-read high-visibility vials at 4 angles: level, 90, 45, and 30 degrees
Large top-view vial windows enable easy readability from multiple angles
High-visibility orange professional grade billet aluminum body is easy to see on conduit and at the jobsite

specifications.Material: Professional Grade Orange Billet Aluminum Body
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars889 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
